evidence.text:
Person A: The heart is fragile.
Person A: Take a deep breath.
Person A: Breathe out.
Person B: Haaaaaa.

Person A: I won’t take them!
Person A: I won’t take them... any more.
Person B: What is wrong?

Person A: Jairam! My husband! ...I was watching kaun banega karodpati I started to hear some sounds... I didn’t see anything at first. Mr Bacchan was talking on the show - you know his voice always calms me down? .. And ... and that horrible smell... of tobacco. I turned and Jairam! He was sitting on that chair...
Person A: Well... one can’t really call it sitting. He was... ummm... hovering. You see doctor... he had no legs! He was only a torso!
